select y.id,y.type, y.title,y.begin_date,y.end_date,y.status, case when y.status =0 then '失效' when y.status =1 then '正常' else '未知' end as statusText from tb_activity y where y.is_del=0
and y.title like "%"#{param.title}"%"
and y.add_seller_id=#{param.addSellerId}
order by y.id desc

select a.id id,a.title title,a.type type,a.agent_id agentId, DATE_FORMAT(a.begin_date,'%Y-%m-%d') gStartTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') gEndTime,a.start_h startH,a.end_h endH, a.add_seller_id addSellerId , a.add_user_id addUserId from tb_activity a where a.is_del=0 and a.id =#{id}
